title: Urban Meyer on Michael Jordan + Future of Scouting
itunes:title: Urban Meyer on Michael Jordan + Future of Scouting
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys give their takeaways from Michael Jordan's "The Last Dance" documentary (2:59). Then, former Ohio State head football coach Urban Meyer joins the show, as he gives his take on Michael Jordan and the documentary (10:08). After that, the pair discuss the future of scouting with everything going on in the world (16:15). To wrap up the show, the duo look at what traits the top edge rushers in the NFL have and give names of some of the best ones in the league (24:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
